name: Phantasmal Martyrs
text: Activate only while you have 2 or more cards in your hand, and control a face-up "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames" or "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder". Send your entire hand to the Graveyard to Special Summon 3 "Phantasmal Martyr Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Attack Position.
